ing: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
des: "This blender drink tastes just like a creamy, orange ice pop. Not for kids! Please note: this recipe contains raw eggs. We recommend that pregnant women, young children, the elderly and the infirm do not consume raw eggs. Important: be sure to use only fresh eggs for this recipe."
ins: In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, half-and-half, egg, vodka and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
